Package main.java.it.unipr.sql

Class SailingClub

java.lang.Object
main.java.it.unipr.sql.SailingClub
public class SailingClub extends Object
The class SailingClub defines a model for the implementation of DAO classes.
Author:
Martina Gualtieri <martina.gualtieri@studenti.unipr.it>, Cristian Cervellera <cristian.cervellera@studenti.unipr.it>
